slogan: Guiding cardiac therapeutics - all from your phone

Founder
Dr. Navara is an EP cardiologist and bioengineer internationally recognized for her contributions to heart rhythm research and medical innovation. To solve this problem, she assembled a multi-disciplinary team including heart rhythm physicians, data scientists, AI engineers, clinical trialists, and regulatory experts. Her passion is to use engineering to transform heart health.
